page.title: 11ROSELAND GDNS. EST., REDRUTH
page.content: 41% OF OCCUPIERS MOVED INTO THEIR HOUSE WHEN IT WAS NEW, 59% AFTER SOMEONE ELSE HAD LIVED IN IT. 3% MOVED IN FROM ROSELAND GDNS. 42% FROM ELSEWHERE IN REDRUTH 39% FROM ELSEWHERE IN CORNWALL 15% FROM OUTSIDE CWL, BUT IN U.K. 6% FROM OUTSIDE U.K. {REASONS FOR MOVING. } 18% LARGER HOUSE..10% SMALLER HOUSE 11% LARGER GARDEN.2% SMALLER GARDEN 21% BETTER HOME...7% CHANGE OF WORK 1% MODERN ESTATE..9% RETIREMENT 17% CHANGE OF PERSONAL CIRCUMSTANCES 14% FIRST PURCHASE..5% OTHER REASONS { { { { {
